content: a lovely confection of shells fans loops and lace the dearly beloved shawl was designed for a special day with a delicate curved shape and a picot edging and made from yarn as soft as a cloud this shawl will become a cherished heirloom the shawl begins at the back of the neck with a dense shell section the row widen with increasing at the row ends and at the center the fabric gently transitions into openwork sections then ends with a lower edging picot row
